<h3 id="X12702">X(12702)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: X3-ABC REFLECTIONS TO 3rd EXTOUCH</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; 2 r - 3 R cos A : :
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; 2 cos A - cos B - cos C + 1 : :
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3+2*(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12702) = 2*X(1)-3*X(3) = X(1)-3*X(40) = 5*X(1)-9*X(165) = 5*X(1)-6*X(1385) = 4*X(1)-3*X(1482) = 7*X(1)-9*X(3576) = 5*X(1)-3*X(7982) = 3*X(4)-5*X(3617) = 2*X(4)-3*X(5790) = 5*X(3617)-6*X(5690) = 10*X(3617)-9*X(5790) = 4*X(5690)-3*X(5790)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(12702) lies on these lines: {1,3}, {4,3617}, {5,962}, {8,30}, {10,381}, {20,952}, {44,1766}, {45,573}, {63,10914}, {72,3426}, {79,11237}, {100,5730}, {140,5550}, {145,376}, {149,6903}, {11917,12698}, {11928,12700}</p>
<p>
X(12702) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {8,6361}, {20,12245}, {40,7991}, {1657,12645}<br>
X(12702) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1,3579), (3,40), (4,5690), (355,11362), (381,3654), (382,355), (399,12778), (944,550), (962,5), (1482,3), (1483,548), (3241,8703), (3242,3098), (3830,3679), (4301,6684), (4930,4421), (5073,5691), (5882,12512), (6767,3587), (7973,6759), (7978,1511), (7982,1385), (7983,12042), (7984,12041), (8148,1), (8158,5709), (9301,5184), (10247,165), (10742,1145), (10912,8666), (12164,9928), (12308,2948), (12316,9905), (12635,8715), (12699,10), (12773,12515)<br>
X(12702) = X(40)-of-X3-ABC-reflections-triangle<br>
X(12702) = X(382)-of-1st-circumperp-triangle<br>
X(12702) = X(1657)-of-2nd-circumperp-triangle<br>
X(12702) = Stammler isogonal conjugate of X(3913)<br>
X(12702) = center of circle that is the poristic locus of X(20)<br>
X(12702) = endo-homothetic center of Ehrmann mid-triangle and outer Garcia triangle; the homothetic center is X(12699)<br>
X(12702) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,40,3579), (1,3579,3), (1,8148,1482), (3,1482,10246), (3,8148,1), (3,10247,1385), (3,10306,11849), (40,1697,3587), (40,7982,165), (46,3057,999), (57,9957,7373), (65,5119,3295), (165,7982,1385), (484,5697,56), (942,1697,6767), (942,3587,3), (1385,7982,10247), (1697,2093,942), (3057,5183,46), (3428,11248,3), (7982,10247,1482)<br>
</p>
